name: Life On Mars (Yorsh)
description:
You are a martian. Try to keep the human rover alive.

Tips :

  • You loose if you are spotted by the humans or if the rover breaks for good (which happens if you don't repair it in time).
  • The longer you last (score in top right corner), the better you do.
  • Rocks can hide you from the rover, but you can't hide from satellites.

Controls :

  • Move with arrow keys or WASD.
  • Repair by going near the failure then press space.
